# --- PART 1: HEADER --- (Max 50 characters. Use imperative mode. DO NOT end with a period.)
# Format: <type>[optional scope]: <description>
#
# VALID TYPES:
# feat (feature), fix (bug fix), docs (documentation), style (formatting),
# refactor (code change, no functional change), test (tests), chore (maintenance)
#
# EXAMPLE: feat(login): add forgotten password link

type(scope): Very brief description

# --- PART 2: BODY --- (Optional. Max 72 characters per line)
# Detailed description: What, how, and why the change was made.

# Body of the commit message.
# Line 2.
# Line 3.

# --- PART 3: FOOTER --- (Optional. Issue links or BREAKING CHANGES)

# LINK ISSUE: (e.g., Refs #123, Closes #456)
#Refs #123

# CO-AUTHOR:
# Co-authored-by: Name <email@example.com>

# BREAKING CHANGE:
# BREAKING CHANGE: Explanation of the incompatible change and how to migrate.
